entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
